attributes.action: Sack the Leader of Aberdeen City Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign if: (1) Your embarrassed by the handling and dismisal of the trump golf development by ACC/one person of which the government and council themselves set the rules (2) your tired of hearing bad news, severe budget cuts from the council who yet exempt themselves from spending £100,000's on overseas trips at taxpayer expense (3) Are increasingly irritated at the ongoing waste of money that is what they call traffic management (4) increasing council tax costs yet dimishing services, e.g fortnightly collections of rubbish. (5) you believe the council should be run like a business and not as a cash cow with a blank cheque. i.e. people should be sacked for not performing well. (6) you believe spending £250,000 on the words "aberdeen city and shire" was a total waste of our hard earned cash.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
